start:
ğŸ‘‹ Welcome! I'am your personal Twitch bot. I will notify you when your favorite streamers are live.

To import all your followed streamers, please use /import command, or use `/follow [nickname]` to follow a streamer.

Got questions about other commands? Use /help command.

github.text:
Hello! I'am a *richardscull*, creator of this bot.
If you like this bot, please consider to star bot's repository on GitHub. I would really appreciate it!

_Thanks in advance! â¤ï¸_

commands.text:
ğŸ“ Commands
Here is a list of all available commands:

*/commands* - Get intormation about all commands
*/follow* - Follow a streamer. Usage: `/follow [username]` Example: `/follow richardscull`
*/following* - Get a list of all followed streamers.
*/github* - Get a link to bot's GitHub repository.
*/import* - Import all followed streamers from Twitch. Requires to be logged in
*/language* - Change bot's language.
*/login* - Login to Twitch.
*/logout* - Logout from Twitch.
*/logout* - Logout from Twitch.
*/profile* - Get a profile of a streamer. Requires to be logged in. Usage: `/profile`. _Alternative usage:_ `/profile [username]`. Example: `/profile richardscull`
*/start* - Get a welcome message.
*/unfollow* - Unfollow a streamer. Usage: `/unfollow [username]`. Example: `/unfollow richardscull`
